Late checkout till 4 pm subject to availability
Terms and conditions
This offer is only applicable for tickets booked online via the Reel Cinemas website or through the Reel Cinemas application
Your monthly spend on the card should be  5,000 to avail the Buy 1 Get 1 free movie tickets.
Cardholders whose spend is below the required amount where applicable, will be charged the full amount.
Valid on a maximum of 6 tickets (3 free) per month, additional tickets will be charged at full price while booking.
Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage.

Up to  300,000 decease cover per cardholder
 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization
Up to  60,000 job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment
